team.name: Joshua R Lange
team.bioHtml: Experienced education leader, program manager, lecturer, eLearning developer, and product manager.

jobs.title: Chief Marketing Officer
jobs.description:
You are a dynamic and highly professional person who knows how to navigate higher education international recruitment; deal with university administration and faculty; work with students from diverse cultural backgrounds; and have a strong interest in partnerships and selling education solutions that solve problems in higher and adult education. 

ESSENTIAL: You should be fluent or native-speaker of English, have at least 1-2 years full time work experience, experience leading teams either at work or in personal life, and a Masters degree. 

Please read our Values before applying:  https://advancedlanguageinstitute.com/our-values/

You have to be able to 'keep up' with a highly energetic founder and make decisions on behalf of the company.  You need to be able to think and work independently, while keeping in constant communication with our partners and customers. We want someone bold but also smart, someone creative but also reasonable. 

As an executive of a language teaching organization at the highest level, your English must be fluent or native-speaker, you should speak at least one additional language fluently, and you should have a degree in Marketing or MBA with focus on Marketing from an accredited university.  You need to have the confidence and poise to deal with law firm partners at leading global law firms and professors at leading global universities, amongst many others, so intercultural competence is the key to this position besides positive energy and marketing prowess.
